class_e_08_battle_01: It’s finally game day! Today is our final exam![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_08_battle_02:
Time to put on your game faces and do battle
with those test sheets![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_08_question_01:
1. Which cheer boosts Attack and Sp. Atk for all
    allies during a Tera Raid Battle?

A) Go all out!
B) Go all in!
C) Out we go!
class_e_08_question_02:
2. What do we call the battles that Pokémon sent
    out with the R Button do on their own?

A) You-Can-Do-It Battles
B) Auto Fights
C) Auto Battles
class_e_08_question_03:
3. How should you obtain LP?

A) Take on Gyms
B) Exchange materials
C) Hack the system
class_e_08_question_04:
4. High-level Pokémon are adjusted to what level
    when using Flat Rules in Link Battles?

A) Lv. 50
B) Lv. 60
C) Lv. 100
class_e_08_question_05:
5. When using Normal Rules in Link Battles, you
    can use multiple Pokémon of the same species
    and multiples of the same held item.

A) True
B) False
class_e_08_battle_03: Time’s up! Put your pencils down![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_08_battle_04:
I saw you giving it everything you’ve got! I’m sure
you’ll all get perfect scores![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_08_battle_05:
You all did so well in my class! If you pass this
test, you’ll officially be battle masters![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_08_battle_06:
Now go ask for your surely stellar scores at the
front desk, you little rascals![VAR 0114(0024)]
